cyclone.name: CLAUDETTE
cyclone.current_location: about 125 miles south of Morgan City, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: moving north-to-north-northeast and expected to arc northeastward across the north-central Gulf Coast toward Alabama/Georgia through the weekend
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: south-central Louisiana coast near Morgan City

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch area not extended to the Texas coast
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from east of Morgan City, LA to the Okaloosa/Walton County line, FL including Lake Pontchartrain/New Orleans
weather_observation.impacted_coast: central and eastern Louisiana, Mississippi, Alabama, and the western Florida Panhandle
weather_observation.wind: Occasional gusts 20-25 kt possible from outer rainbands; sustained tropical-storm-force winds not expected
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected on the Upper Texas Coast
weather_observation.rainfall: Scattered squalls with 1–2 inches of rain possible; widespread flooding rains remain east of the port
weather_observation.other_hazards: Minimal operational impact expected; slight increase in choppy seas and periodic lightning in passing squalls
